snippet: A young man who participated in a mob attack on a Detroit-area motorist needed a father to “beat the hell” out of him to discourage him from committing such a crime, a judge said Thursday.
abstract: Judge James Callahan sentences Latrez Cummings to six months in jail for participating in mob attack on Steve Utash, Detroit-area motorist who accidentally struck a boy.
lead_paragraph: A young man who participated in a mob attack on a Detroit-area motorist needed a father to “beat the hell” out of him to discourage him from committing such a crime, a judge said Thursday.

headline.main: Michigan: Sharp Words, and Sentence of 6 Months for Man in Mob Attack
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Sharp Words, and Sentence of 6 Months for Man in Mob Attack
